name: com.unity.logging
description: The Logging package provides interfaces for creating and processing runtime events and logging output.

_upm.changelog:
### Changed
* Console sink reports timestamp in the local timezone, instead of UTC.
* Logger settings set 'CaptureStacktrace' to true by default.

### Fixed

* Improve compilation when using UNITY_DOTS_DEBUG

### Security

samples.description: Simple Sample using a system to initialize and use logging
